result.markdown:
--- title: "Odysseas Papapetrou" --- ::: {.panel-tabset} ## Profile ### Professional appointments - July 2025 - current: Associate Professor at [Eindhoven University of Technology](https://www.tue.nl), leader of Scalable Online Data Management group - June 2025 - current: Affiliated Researcher at [Archimedes Research Unit](https://archimedesai.gr/en/), [Athena Research Center](https://www.athenarc.gr), Greece - July 2018 - June 2025: Assistant Professor at [Eindhoven University of Technology](https://www.tue.nl) - Aug. 2017 - June 2018: Marie Skłodowska-Curie EPFL Fellow, [EPFL](https://www.epfl.ch/) - Jan. 2016 - Aug. 2017: Research and Teaching Associate at [Dias lab, EPFL](https://www.epfl.ch/labs/dias/) - April 2011 - Dec. 2015: Researcher at [SoftNet lab](https://www.softnet.tuc.gr/en), [Technical University of Crete](https://www.tuc.gr/) - Sept. 2012 - Sept. 2013: Adjunct Lecturer at [Open University of Cyprus](https://www.ouc.ac.cy/index.php/en/) - Oct. 2005 - March 2011: Research associate at [L3S Research Center](https://www.l3s.de), [University of Hannover](https://www.uni-hannover.de/en/) - 2004 - 2005: Software consultant, [NetU Consultants Ltd](https://www.netugroup.com), Cyprus - 2002 - 2003: Research Assistant, [Department of Computer Science](https://www.cs.ucy.ac.cy), [University of Cyprus](https://www.ucy.ac.cy) ### Education - PhD, Computer Science, [University of Hannover](https://www.uni-hannover.de/en/) and [L3S Research Center](https://www.l3s.de), 2011 - MSc, Computer Science, [Saarland University](https://www.uni-saarland.de/en/home.html) and [Max Planck Institute for Informatics](https://www.mpi-inf.mpg.de/home), 2005 - MSc, Advanced Information Technologies, [University of Cyprus](https://www.ucy.ac.cy), 2004 - BSc, Computer Science, [University of Cyprus](https://www.ucy.ac.cy), 2002 ### Research focus My ambition is to unlock the full potential of data, by providing sustainable methods for online analytics. Online analytics comes with strict performance requirements: the results need to be made available almost instantaneously, to allow for interactivity. Sustainability, on the other hand, refers to different properties of the desired solutions: (a) low cost, (b) scalability with the data size and velocity, (c) ease of use at different situations. I have key contributions towards this direction, by building (a) easy-to-use data synopses that allow efficient compact summarization and analytics, and, (b) streaming algorithms, that facilitate processing of the data at line speed. ### Recent Professional Service - 2027: PC member for SIGMOD'27. - 2026: PC member for EDBT'26, Light Load Reviewer for VLDB'26. - 2025: PC member for VLDB Demonstration track, ICDE Industrial track, EDBT; co-chair for MulTiSA@ICDE'25; co-chair for interactive session *The role of Data Management in the Era of AI* at *NWO ICT.Open'25*. - 2024: Publication and proceedings chair for ICDE; co-chair for MulTiSA@ICDE'24; PC member for SIGMOD, EDBT; rapid response reviewer for VLDB. ### Recent Awards and Recognitions - April 2025: SIGMOD Research Highlight Award for [OmniSketch](https://sigmodrecord.org/2025/04/16/omnisketch-streaming-data-analytics-with-arbitrary-predicates/). - April 2025: [Distinguished Reviewer Award](https://2025.sigmod.org/sigmod_awards.shtml) at SIGMOD'25. - April 2025: [PC Honorable Mention](https://edbticdt2025.upc.edu/?contents=honorable-mentions-EDBT.html) at EDBT'25. - August 2024: Our work [OmniSketch](https://dl.acm.org/doi/10.14778/3632093.3632098) received the best paper award at VLDB'24. ### Contact details - Phone: +31 40 247 6087 - Visiting address: MetaForum 7.090, Eindhoven University of Technology, 5600 MB, Eindhoven, The Netherlands - Postal address: M&CS department, Department of Mathematics and Computer Science, PO Box 513, 5600 MB Eindhoven, The Netherlands ## Publications ```{=html}
